title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results are not selected in external jar in Build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, only 3 matches are expected in method getTempDir().
OB: When performing a search for references to the field in an external jar, the search results are not being selected.
EB: When performing a search for references to the 'tmpFir' field in an external jar, you should get 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have the source for rt.jar).
2. Open java.io.File.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
